name: Swofski Shooter - Feedback Demo
description:
Welcome to the Swofski Shooter - Feedback Demo.

A concept game in which you shoot some "bad guys" to unlock different guns.. so Far...

Concept one is a small sandbox in which you can shoot rocks and trees to get resources to build a little base of sorts.

Context, I am a student about to finish university but my passion is making games and I often find myself making a lot of concepts I never release. I quite like this one and hope you all do to. I would love to hear your feedback and ideas for the game and am open to anything.

*Downloaded version recommended*

Controls:Mouse and KeyboardControllerMoveW,A,S,DLeft StickAimMouseRight StickShootLeft Mouse ButtonRight TriggerADSRight Mouse ButtonLeft TriggerReloadRRight BumperInteractFXbox Y / PS TriangleBuild MenuTabLeft BumperRotateScroll WheelRight Bumper
